Package business

Class CharacterManager

java.lang.Object
business.CharacterManager
public class CharacterManager extends Object
Class that manages all related to the character.

  • Method Details

    • createCharacter

      public void createCharacter(String name, String player, int xp, int body, int mind, int spirit, String classe)
      Method used to save the character in persistence
      Parameters:
      name - String that contains the name of the character
      player - String that contains the name of the player
      xp - Integer that contains the experience
      body - Integer that contains the stat body
      mind - Integer that contains the stat mind
      spirit - Integer that contains the stat spirit
      classe - String that contains the class of the character

    • listAllCharacters

      public List<String> listAllCharacters(String name)
      Method that returns all the characters of a player. if the String name is void we return all the characters.
      Parameters:
      name - the name String of the player.
      Returns:
      a list of all the names of the player characters.

    • removeCharacter

      public void removeCharacter(String name)
      Method that deletes a character in persistence
      Parameters:
      name - String that contains the name of the character that we need to delete.

    • findName

      public boolean findName(String name)
      Method that looks in the persistence if the name introduced exists in the persistence.
      Parameters:
      name - String that contains the name of the character.
      Returns:
      boolean that is truie if the character exists and false if not.

    • getAllData

      public String getAllData(String character)
      Method that returns a String that contains all the information of a character.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      String that contains all the information of the character.

      Method that throws the dice to calculate the stats of a character

      public int generateStadistics(int e)

      e - Integer that contains the dice number
      Returns:

    • getCharacter

      public Character getCharacter(String character)
      Method that gets a character for the persistence.
      Parameters:
      character - String name of the character
      Returns:
      instance of the character that have the name indicated.

    • saveExperience

      public void saveExperience(String name, int xp)
      Method that saves the experience of the character.
      Parameters:
      name - String name of the character
      xp - Integer of the total experience that won in the adventure.

    • calcClass

      public String calcClass(String class_, int Lvl)
      Method that calculat see if a class evolves.
      Parameters:
      class_ - String name of the starter class
      Lvl - Integer that contains the actual level of the character.
      Returns:
      a String of the actual class according of the level.
